title: BulkRNABert: Cancer prognosis from bulk RNA-seq based language models
details: M Gélard, G Richard, T Pierrot, PH Cournède - bioRxiv, 2024
abstract: RNA sequencing (RNA-seq) has become a key technology in precision medicine, especially for cancer prognosis. However, the high dimensionality of such data may restrict classic statistical methods, thus raising the need to learn dense …
